briefTitle: Understanding the Value of Community Vital Signs in Primary Care
officialTitle: Understanding the Value of Community Vital Signs in Primary Care
conditions: Colon Cancer, Breast Cancer, Cervical Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Cardiovascular Disease
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Aims 1a and 1b: Patients seen at one of the 12 study practices
* Aims 2 and 3: Clinicians at one of the 12 study practices

Exclusion Criteria:

* Aims 1a and 1b: Patients outside of the age range
* Aims 2 and 3: Clinicians involved with the design of the research protocol.
